<h3 id="X11827">X(11827)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC-X(3) REFLECTIONS AND OUTER-JOHNSON</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^7-2*(b+c)*a^6-(3*b^2-2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^5+3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a^4+8*b^2*c^2*a^3+4*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*b*c*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2*a-(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11827) = 2*(R+r)*X(3)-(R+2*r)*X(12)</b>
<p>X(11827) lies on these lines:{1,5812}, {2,10894}, {3,12}, {4,958}, {5,5251}, {8,5842}, {11,6928}, {20,100}, {21,7680}, {30,40}, {35,10954}, {36,6922}, {52,517}, {55,6868}, {56,6827}, {72,515}, {104,6903}, {165,10483}, {182,10795}, {376,10786}, {388,6987}, {411,5080}, {495,10902}, {529,944}, {535,4297}, {550,2077}, {631,10599}, {946,11113}, {952,5904}, {962,11114}, {993,6831}, {1001,6936}, {1072,1104}, {1076,1455}, {1329,6905}, {1376,6934}, {1385,5434}, {1482,3058}, {1593,11391}, {1657,6244}, {1753,1885}, {1837,5709}, {2975,6840}, {3035,6942}, {3098,10872}, {3486,5758}, {3523,10585}, {3575,5130}, {3576,5290}, {3585,6907}, {3614,6863}, {3816,6902}, {3826,6901}, {3925,6917}, {4293,6865}, {4302,10306}, {4324,5537}, {4413,6885}, {4999,6830}, {5046,7681}, {5204,6891}, {5220,5759}, {5223,5881}, {5229,6908}, {5234,5587}, {5247,5721}, {5260,6839}, {5303,6972}, {5433,6882}, {5584,6850}, {6256,7580}, {6684,11112}, {6690,6875}, {6691,6963}, {6825,10895}, {6836,10522}, {6872,11496}, {6988,10590}, {8158,9668}, {8273,9657}, {9578,10268}, {10785,11194}, {10830,11414}, {10921,11824}, {10922,11825}, {10955,11248}</p>
<p>
X(11827) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (6284,7491), (7354,3), (11826,40)<br>
X(11827) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3,10526,12), (20,3436,11500), (6936,10532,1001)<br>
</p>
